content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at (-2, -76)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-2.0, -76.0) mining iron ore
- Iron chest at (-1.5, -74.5) storing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (0.0, -77.0)
- Burner inserter at (-1.5, -73.5) configured to move items from chest to furnace

###Copper/Iron Processing Setup at (-21, -73)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) for mining copper/iron ore
- Iron chest at (-21.5, -74.5)
- Burner inserter at (-20.5, -74.5)
- Stone furnace at (-19.0, -74.0) containing copper plates

###Standalone Furnaces at (3, -73)
Two connected furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (3.0, -73.0)
- Stone furnace at (5.0, -73.0)

ERROR TIPS

###Furnace Fuel Management Issues
- Check furnace fuel capacity before attempting to insert more fuel
- The furnace at (0.0, -77.0) is already full with 50/50 fuel items

###Inserter Placement Issues
- Multiple attempts were made to place and clean up inserters
- Ensure proper positioning of inserters relative to source and destination entities
- Verify inserter pickup and drop positions align with intended material flow

###Resource Management
- The mining drill at (-21.0, -73.0) has no fuel
- Ensure mining equipment is properly fueled to maintain continuous operation
